nodes.text: Onna Ferran was a male Rodian smuggler living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Imperial forces under Darth Marr.
Onna Ferran appears as a Smuggler trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
